website_summaries.verdict: A good buy for a smaller unit that cleans well and saves space.
pros: Users appreciate the space-saving design that makes it a flexible solution for even the smallest homes or apartments
This unit stands out for cleaning efficiently and drying evenly
cons: The smaller size makes it best for small households and small loads
Like the larger LG model, it tends to take longer to dry, and a few think the cost is a bit high

customer_reviews.title: Great washer dryer combo
customer_reviews.text: Use it in my motorhome as a full time rv'r... love it
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Dryer takes a long time -- but, that was ...
customer_reviews.text: Dryer takes a long time -- but, that was info I learned in research. The loads that I do dry by machine are well dried.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Tetz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent machine, Welbilt
customer_reviews.text: Excellent machine, Welbilt. There is a strong odor after the first few drawing Cycles. Excellent Energy savings especially if you decide to hang dry your clothes. Which is easy because the high spin pretty much leaves to close damp.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Karsen

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Just a big learning curve how to get ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Just a big learning curve how to get the best wash. Also must remove clothes immediately after the drying cycle or they are a wrinkled mess, which no hanging up will resolve. Had to rewash to get the wrinkles out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Remove shipping bolts should be in huge letters as a first step
customer_reviews.text: Please in big huge letters make sure the shipping bolts are removed as the first step not the second step. I thought the vibration and knocking was normal until I realized the shipping bolts have to be removed. My mistake. The only bad thing about this machine is I wish it had more space to put clothes in. It does take forever but because it's efficient that way.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Alden

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Won't drain after using it for a about a year. Drying feature leaves a lot to be desired.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Save time&space.  Best apartment unit
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this machine. Considering it takes less space and no moving laundry through, it was worth every penny. My parents have one of these too and they love it. We did find that pod-based detergent doesn't work as well as regular liquid or powder detergent. If you have dog hair that gets on clothes it will collect on the rubber sealing ring. Best way to remove it is using a small silicone baking grippy mit to wipe along the ring.
customer_reviews.author: Ally S

customer_reviews.title: Good solid washing machine
customer_reviews.text: Good solid washing machine. Works well in small spaces. Love the settings. Looks great. Fits enough clothes. I dont know what else to say about a product that meets my expectations fully! I've owned/used it since first week of January and no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Tiny load space, drying function practically bakes wrinkles into clothes, didn’t last more than 3 years of light use without requiring service twice and not being worth fixing. Not worth the space saved. AVOID!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kellie P.

customer_reviews.title: Pathetic
customer_reviews.text: Arrived damaged and attempted to test it anyway and does not hold water. All connections are tight and the unit is level but still does not perform. Have been trying to get this refunded since before JUlY! I am understanding because of COVID-19 but this is completely ridiculous. I wish I could give this and the company 0 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: I am in love with this washer/dryer!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this washer/dryer. It is beautiful. I am an old lady and I was able to hook this up myself. It does a great job on my laundry. It is quiet except when spinning. I can set the speed of the spin and on the high speed the cloths comes out with little water left. The only minus is that I own 2 cats and the dryer does not remove all of the cat hair.
customer_reviews.author: Julie A. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Love not having to go to the laundromat to wash my clothes. I’d rather do two small ones at home than spend an hour at the laundromat. Not good for sheets or blankets. Used my w/d hook up for the dishwasher and the w/d combo, perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Naomi A.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love this washer dryer after using it almost every day for a few months. It washes about half a typical load but it washes and dries way better than I expected, even blankets, rugs, and towels come out dry. I’ve only used one setting so far but there are tons of settings and you can even set your own cycles with an app. Perfect for our small apartment. I would highly recommend it for those with a small space. Cycles take several hours but I just run it over night and wake up to clean laundry.
customer_reviews.author: E. K. Browne

customer_reviews.title: Works great so far
customer_reviews.text: make sure you take the 4 shipping bolts out of the back or it will shake like crazy
customer_reviews.author: Jared Carvell

customer_reviews.title: I like the fact that it takes little space and only 110 wiring.
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea of all in one unit. I am disappointed in how long it takes to do one load. I am adjusting my attitude and accepting the fact that I can’t have my cake and eat it too. I would definitely recommend it to anyone with a limited amount of space and steep basement stairs.
customer_reviews.author: Treva Lange

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this machine for about a month: LOVE IT!! It fits in a tiny space, which is important because my laundry room is microscopic. The top is a nice little work space. The dryer isn't important to me because I usually dry my items on a drying racks; nevertheless, the dryer works fine. I was concerned it might not hold a reasonable sized load, but not a problem. My only complaint is that access to the machine door is *low.* Researched a pedestal for it and found that LG does not make one.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Works fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Love this washer dryer!! Would recommend to anyone with an RV or small space!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great washer/dryer so far!!
customer_reviews.text: Needs a solid base to reduce shaking during high speed spins. It's perfect for 2 people . Even if one's a retired grease monkey and the other one is a gardener. Totally hands free. 5lb loads dry perfectly .
customer_reviews.author: awlthumbs

customer_reviews.title: Does the job but takes forever...
customer_reviews.text: It cleans amd dries the clothes, but it takes forever!! If you select wash-dry option it's 3hr 45 min. If you select another option it completes in 1hr 45, but then you need to manually select dry another 3 hrs... Do not plan on more than 2 loads a day... It's also very very noisy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great and convenient
customer_reviews.text: Great space saver, super clean clothes, not thrilled with the wrinkles but still working it out
customer_reviews.author: Jose Rocha

customer_reviews.title: Good machine
customer_reviews.text: This machine is very compact but efficient. It really washes the clothes well! I would watch the dryer heat because even on low, it seems to shrink my slacks. Also drying time is extended. Overall a good product for a small space.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Crap machine but outstanding customer service
customer_reviews.text: Bought this machine and it never worked, LG sent technicians to fix but still didn’t work. Honestly have to say that the company I bought from gets 5 stars for their customer service.
customer_reviews.author: sharonB

customer_reviews.title: WRINKLES!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm seriously considering taking a hammer to this thing. No matter what I try, and trust me, I've tried every possible combination of cycles, etc., on this pile of junk, I still can wrinkles that won't come out with ANY amount of ironing. This thing is ruining my clothes. Jeans are the absolute worst. I CAN'T BELIEVE I'M IRONING JEANS!!! Trust me (and many others in these reviews) stay away from this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Lehmann

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine. It does a great job cleaning the clothes and drying them. I've had zero problems with it. Like others have said there is a little bit of rubber smell at first bit went away after a few uses. . This machine is a wonderful space saving size and you don't have to stop what you're doing in order to put clothes from washer into drier. It has enough options for weekday I need and I love the chimes it plays at the end the cycle.
customer_reviews.author: Awesomeness

customer_reviews.title: Speechless
customer_reviews.text: The most amazing customer service and product knowledge from this company! My item was described, fit to my needs, and delivered with the highest level of excellence that one could ever receive! I want to say thank you for everything you do at Specialized Appliances!
customer_reviews.author: Erica P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: haven't used it yet but i kow it's a wonderfu machine!
customer_reviews.author: rd

customer_reviews.title: Not so good
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy or waste your time. It's a big inconvenience especially with that seller.
customer_reviews.author: janel johnson

customer_reviews.title: Dont do it!!
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for 24 hours ..it shakes, it loud, and it doesnt dry...I put in one pair of sweat pants, a sweat shirt, and a towel...and it came out wet! not to mention this is so small it would never hold a queen or king size comforter...im so sad I spent every last dime I had on this and I know it going to cost me so much to return it...dont buy this...and especially dont buy this online!
customer_reviews.author: Merissa

customer_reviews.title: A good option for small spaces unless you have lots of laundry.
customer_reviews.text: I really am impressed with how clean and soft the clothes come out. I would have given it 5 stars except that it takes 2 hours to dry a small load. It takes some getting used to. I wash a full load and divide it to dry. I use a fabric softener because so many reviews complain of wrinkles. I don’t get any wrinkles but I don’t let the clothes sit in dryer all day. Works great for small spaces. Cleans very well! I’ve only had for short time so will review after a year to see how it’s working then.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic service and a great machine!
customer_reviews.text: The seller, Appliance Giant, is amazingly helpful and the machine arrived in time and was installed by very professional, kind installers. A1 service! The machine is a very good washer. I have to get used to the dryer program yet, which takes quite a bit longer than a normal dryer. But I knew that before hand. It fits our place well because it takes up so little space. I love the extra options: pre-wash, extra water, extra rinse! I was a bit hesitant to buy this kind of appliance online, but the seller is trustworthy and the real deal! Highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: HVZ

customer_reviews.title: Not very functional
customer_reviews.text: It took a long time to receive this washer/dryer combo with much anticipation. Leveled and installed correctly it still vibrates so much it sounds like it may send your house into orbit. Only very small loads work. If you want to dry you can only put a few items in (1/2) and it still doesn't dry fully even after hours. Very disappointed. Would be happy to return if possible.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: SO MUCH DOG HAIR LEFT BEHIND
customer_reviews.text: We've had this unit for over a year, and while it does save us space in our extremely small house, it's a bit of a pain. It take HOURS to dry, clothes come out super wrinkly, oh and, it doesn't remove the dog hair!! DO NOT get this if you have a pet that sheds. You will find the inside of the door covered in a sick layer of hair after every wash. Which you will also have to disgusting scrap out from the creases of the rubber. It's a great idea, but I would not recommend it for anyone who has a lot of laundry to do or has a pet that sheds.
customer_reviews.author: epm

customer_reviews.title: PIECE OF JUNK
customer_reviews.text: After 2.5 years the thing broke on me! It is ridiculous. On top of that the dry cycle leaves clothes damp and they come out wrinkled. Do yourself a favor and avoid this.
customer_reviews.author: John Gee

customer_reviews.title: Learning Curve:  how to decrease wrinkles!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT and have had mine for 10 years. The common ‘complaint’ by others is the wrinkles.....there is a learning curve. I’ve learned to do heavy items together, light items seperatly. Otherwise I also just add more time at the outset for the drying time. You can also just use the drying feature if you hand wash—when you turn the power on you just adjust the drying time and no other buttons, then press start. EASY! My unit is in a downstairs so I love that I can set it and forget it for 3 hours! I usually do the preset and have it start and finish when I have to be in the downstairs for other reasons.
customer_reviews.author: C Shotts II

customer_reviews.title: LG must stand for Love Garbage
customer_reviews.text: I install and repair this model all the time. It is not recommended for large families. If you're single then it may last but these units don't last a good 3 or 4yrs. If the bearings ever go bad, might as well buy a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Q ProductionsTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Vibration and water leak from the front door during spin cycle
customer_reviews.text: Terrible experience with this LG washer dryer combo. Less than one year, the vibration during spin cycle is getting louder and louder. And now starts to leaking water from the front door during spin cycle! I wish there is another manufacturer make a better ventless washer/dryer combo. LG is definitely terrible at it!
customer_reviews.author: Wei Feng

customer_reviews.title: Horrible machine
customer_reviews.text: Clothes come out wrinkled and you can't get the wrinkles out no matter how many times you rewash them. Had to take clothes to laundromat to get wrinkles out. Worst machine ever.
customer_reviews.author: Virtual

customer_reviews.title: horrible purchase
customer_reviews.text: this machine lasted about 19 months and quit pumping the water out after cleaning. i went through a new pump...but that didnt work. beware
customer_reviews.author: cw

customer_reviews.title: Lovin' it....
customer_reviews.text: The lg combo is great. Removing the clothing immediately and keeping the load size as directed(small) works very nicely and yields very clean clothes. Makes laundry simple and less burdensome. My only complaints are the shaking/vibration of the unit, however can be resolved with balancing items. Will look into that. Plus takes a long time but it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Frequentamaz123

customer_reviews.title: This seller will not let you cancel 2 hours after ordering, so be careful.
customer_reviews.text: Needed to cancel when I found out how heavy it is.
customer_reviews.author: Steven68005
